config.mandatoryFields: Fields with an asterisk are mandatory.

info.title: Hi {username}, welcome to the PostNL extension!
info.onboardingStep1: Find your API key at {link}. Or request an API key here.
info.onboardingStep2: Activate PostNL's shipping options in Shopware's Shipping settings.
info.onboardingStep3: Activate PostNL's shipping options per sales channel.

returnAddress.customerCodeWarning: Please note, a return customer code must be used for return shipments
returnAddress.contract: I have a return contract with PostNL
returnAddress.useHomeAddress: Return orders to address instead of reply number
returnAddress.name: Last name

warning.country: Please (re)select a valid country under sender address first.

description.shipmentAndReturn: The shipment label can also be used as the return label, but this needs to be activated per order.
description.labelInTheBox: An extra return label will be printed and should be included in the shipment.

returnOptions.allowImmediateShipmentAndReturn: Labels can be used for returns immediately, without requiring activation.

productSelection.combinationNotice: Not all combinations are possible. The most appropriate product will be selected based on your latest selection.

list.missingProductId: No PostNL shipping method assigned, please select one first

changeShipping.title: Change shipping method
changeShipping.warning: Unable to change shipping method when the selected orders have a mix of destination zones (NL, BE, EU, World)

createShipments.title: Ship this order | Ship {count} orders
createShipments.missingProductIdMany: One or more selected orders is missing a PostNL shipping method. Please select one first.
createShipments.missingProductIdSingle: The selected order is missing a PostNL shipping method. Please select one first.

success.smartReturn: Created smart return | Created smart returns

errors.label: Could not generate a label for order {orderNumbers} | Could not generate labels for {count} orders: {orderNumbers}
errors.mail: Could not send an email for order {orderNumbers} | Could not send emails for {count} orders: {orderNumbers}

smartReturn.label: Create return label
smartReturn.description: Create and email a return label the customer can use to ship the products back to you.

shipmentAndReturn.label: Activate "shipment and return" label
shipmentAndReturn.description: Activate the customer's "shipment and return" label. They can use the original shipment label to return the products.

labelInTheBox.label: Label in the Box
labelInTheBox.description: The customer has received a return label in their shipment, they can use this to ship the products back.
